dev.toliner.yokaidrone.api

Interface Ability<T extends AbilityConfig>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandHandlingAbility

    public Ability<T extends AbilityConfig>

    Ability is a configurable function for interface Yokai. When the Ability is gained by interface Yokai, it should configure JDABuilder based on config to capture event from Discord. All implementation should be object-declaration

    See Also:
    interface Yokai, interface Yokai, JDABuilder

    • Method Detail

      • gainedByYokai

        void gainedByYokai(@NotNull
                   Yokai yokai,
                   @NotNull
                   T config,
                   @NotNull
                   net.dv8tion.jda.api.JDABuilder builder)

        Configure Ability and builder for yokai based on config

        Parameters:
        yokai - The interface Yokai which gain this ability.
        config - Configuration for this Ability.
        builder - JDABuilder instance to configure about discord event.
        See Also:
        builder, yokai, config

      • dependencies

        void dependencies(@NotNull
                  DependencyMap $receiver)

      • getDefaultConfig

        @NotNull
T getDefaultConfig()
